full_text: UNITED 9/22/2023 JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place HHW File No. A21 431 061 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: SEX DATE OF BIRTH Name BUI, NGA QUANG M 12/31/15 Street 91-918 Ahon St. PLACE OF BIRTH Address Ewa Beach, Hi. 96706 Thenh Ho Vietnem City, State, Zip NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Vietn-mese PRIORITY DATE REMARKS NONPREFERENCE: Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244( )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 P L. 95-145 (Other law Specify) July 08 1975.
